Class DataPadding

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataPadding

  • public class DataPadding
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to handle paddings.

    • Method Detail

      • borderInterpolate

        public static int borderInterpolate(int p,
                    int len,
                    int borderType)
        Find a source index of an array when given a position out of the range.
        Parameters:
        p - The position.
        len - The length of the array.
        borderType - Border extrapolation mode.
        Returns:
        The valid array index.

      • copyMakeBorder

        public static byte[][] copyMakeBorder(byte[][] src,
                      int sHeight,
                      int sWidth,
                      int top,
                      int bottom,
                      int left,
                      int right,
                      int borderType,
                      byte value)
        Padding an array.
        Parameters:
        src - The source array
        sHeight - Array height
        sWidth - Array width
        top - Top border size
        bottom - Bottom border size
        left - Left border size
        right - Right border size
        borderType - The border extrapolation mode
        value - The border value when constant border mode is used.
        Returns:
        The padded array.
